    • Constructor Detail

      • Vignette

        public Vignette(int width,
                int height,
                double radius)
        Constructs new vignette effect with given values
        Parameters:
        width - full width of vignette effect
        height - full height of vignette effect
        radius - approx. radius of the visible area (gradient extent)

    • Method Detail

      • getIntensity

        public double getIntensity()
        Returns:
        effect intensity in range [0..1]

      • setIntensity

        public void setIntensity(double intensity)
        Set effect intensity. The value must be in range [0..1].
        Parameters:
        intensity - effect intensity
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the value is outside [0..1]

      • getRadius

        public double getRadius()
        Returns:
        approx. radius defining the extents of color gradient

      • setRadius

        public void setRadius(double radius)
        Set gradient radius.
        Parameters:
        radius - approx. radius defining the extents of color gradient
